channel.title: NMS:CROX on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NMS:CROX on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Crocs Sinks Most Since March 2020 on Tariffs, Cautious Consumers
item.description: Crocs Inc. shares dropped the most since the start of the Covid-19 pandemic on a weaker outlook, with the maker of colorful clogs warning that cautious consumers are further pulling back on spending.
